pages.text: The extractor has filtering-capabilities. It has no GUI, so read this chapter to learn more about it!

To enable filtering-functions, you do the following:$(br2)1. Right-click the extractor with a redstone torch.$(br)2. Right-click the extractor with the item you want to extract. $(br)3. Right-click the extractor again with a redstone-torch.

The extractor will notify you of each step. To put it another way: redstone-torches enable and disable settings-mode.$(br)When you right-click with an empty hand, the extractor will tell you what it's doing.
